string.text: What tickles your fancy, earning some coin or booze to spend it on?
Welcome to the best bar in the whole zone!
Let me patch you up, stalker.
Come by again to continue our conversation.
If you hear something interesting, come keep me company.
Don't forget old Kolobok! Stop by some time!
Ah, men of the people? What's troubling you?
Ugh, not a moment's peace! I'm coming, damn you!
Will you ever just leave me alone? You all think I enjoy getting bothered like this, don't you?
If you haven't had enough of this in the zone, come over and pop a few targets. Unlike out there, these don't shoot back.
Man, you blew my mind with those scores!
Come back anytime you need to vent your anger at those targets.
That was quite a shooting exhibition.
My critters won't harm you. Just don't stick your fingers in their cages.
Don't be afraid Stalker, come closer. I ain't like the rest of them.
Stop by sometime to pet my little animals.
Stay in touch, you are a fine specimen yourself, ha ha ha!
My zoo is always open to visitors.

%c[default]Guys, this is Strelok. I didn't expect Doc to fix me up so fast. I heard rumors that someone has learned of our success and is seeking to contact us. I have a bad feeling about this. I fear we may need to hurry up with our next visit to the center. \n%c[ui_8]Hey Strelok, glad to see you alive. Fang and I found all the parts we needed and put together two decoders. We left them both in a stash near the Scorcher. We'll pick them up when we head for the center. \n%c[default]Ghost, that's great news. Our plan is as follows. We can't make it through the underground, so our only option is to go past the Scorcher. I'm on my way to Sakharov to pick up a device that will help us get through the Scorcher in one piece. Wait for me at the military warehouses.
Yo bro, I'll be with you in a sec.
Want some good old medicine? You came to the right place, dude!
Gimme five, bro! What's it gonna be? A hard drink or a soft smoke?
Come by next week, we're expecting some real high class herb that'll get you higher than high.
If you want to lift the elbow, swing by, I'm always here.
Peace out, dude! Too bad we didn't roll a joint together.
Who is it again? I ain't got time for this, you hear?
What's this, your backyard? Who let you in?
Me again? Man, what a lousy day!
And quit bothering me over nothing! I'm busy!
You had better go monster hunting instead of distracting important people.
What have you got for me, sonny?
What did you break this time?
Come see me if you need anything.
Is it me, or are everyone's hands growing out of their asses? Nah, it's not me.
All right, enough talking, let's get to work.
Good luck. Keep me abreast of any new information.

Yo, Ashot, are you gonna bring that over here or what? That will be 20 dollars! You cheapskate! Alright, get them from the commandant. Come again? So how 'bout it, Ashot? You want it, you get it, okay? Move your ass! You're a real jerk, you know that? You're just sitting there, doing nothing all day! Hey, you go suck my- Cut the bullshit, you bozos! You're making the whole base sound like a used car dealership!

Hey Mr. Fixie! We got a used gun, you have a look? That will be 20 dollars. Eh, come on! Yesterday's joke, no funny today! Alright, bring your stupid gun over here. I no can leave my shop alone, you come to me, eh? How 'bout you just use that damn gun right in your shop in the most unnatural way possible? Hey! Ashot, Yar, both of you shut the hell up! Your yapping is worse than my mother's. I can't take it anymore!

Hey Yar! Yup? Look what I got in here! What, you got in there, Ashot? Come here and see! You got nothing that would impress even a little girl! Eh, no, you come over. I've got something to show you, or should I stick it out for you to see? I no have a microscope! Have you both lost your freaking minds!? What is this a dick measuring contest? Shut the hell up now!
Wait a second, fella! I'll be right there!
Come, come, let me teach you haggling 101!
Way to offload your crap on me! I'll know better next time!

Shit man, way to screw up! What a rotten son of a bitch that commandant! 
All that horse shit he gave us about how the outpost was out of ammo! 
Those freedom bastards wounded two of our boys! 
%c[ui_8]Enough yapping! Let's cover up our tracks and get out of here!
Target lost! Officer, take your men and clear the sector!
What you staring at? This ain't no zoo!
What's so interesting, huh? Friggin' idiots.
Come, everyone, and rejoice, Khaletskiy's in a cage!
Get lost and stay lost, Merc!
Don't stop on your way out the door, and keep going till you hit an anomaly.
You wanna upgrade something or patch it up?
What can I do for you?
If you need anything else, come by.
Sorry if I wasn't much help.
If you find some more upgrade parts, get them over here and we'll see what we can do.
What can I do you for?
Sorry if I don't have what you're looking for.
Come back later, I might get a new shipment.
Nice doing business with an honest stalker.
Come on, tell me what you got for me!
Relax, don't be shy, what brings you here?
Attention! You're approaching the secured perimeter of an ecological disaster zone! Illicit crossing of the perimeter is a criminal act!
Any attempt to penetrate the secured zone will be punished by any means necessary! Patrols have the right to shoot on sight!
The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardize your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!

The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Do not let the looters hide behind your backs! They bring radioactive unidentified items from the Zone that are highly dangerous for human health and life. Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon! Do not put your lifes and the lifes of your families at risk for the sake of dubious profit!
If the going gets tough, pay me a visit.
Keep our business hush hush, and you'll live longer.
If you want advice, drop in anytime.
If your dumbass is looking for adventure, this is where we deal them out.
Looking for a tip or just some booze?
I like it when feathers fill the air!
I like it when feathers fill the air!
Butchering some varmint, now that's what I call fun!
Let's put some holes in those birdies, huh?
Something tells me a couple of those crows are going down.
Come again, brother! Shoot some more!
Thanks a lot and have a nice day!
Pop in my crib if you need something.
Something new comes up you holler at me.
Say what you got to say or get the hell out.
Who is this pretty boy we got here?
And to what do we owe this honor?
I say it's time to catch a buzz. Senka, get up, you bum!
Thanks a bunch, yeah! Pour it Senka!
Leaving already? How about one for the road?
You got the papers ready? All those excise labels and stuff got to be just right.
Quit shouting, my head is killing me!
Senka and I are always glad to see our customers.
No loot, the point is moot.
Tell me, where do you dig up these things?
Have a nice doing business with you!
What you carrying over there, son? Show me!
Got some loot? That's a beaut.
My best respects to an honest man.
Pop in anytime you feel like chatting.
Well, next time you're at the swamps, don't be a stranger.
Stop by for a chat anytime. This place is so boring.
I see you. Just a minute.
Look who we got visiting our swamps! You sure are a whiff of fresh air!
If you need me, you know where to find me.
Hmm, if that is all, I better get back to my work.
Hopefully my answers will be of help to us all.
Oh, I didn't notice you come in.
If you learn any news, come back and share it with me.
Stay in touch, we may need your help soon.
Come see me if you learn something important.
Glad to see you. Got any new questions for me?
Speak of the devil, I was just thinking of you.
Remember, to be a good shooter, get your gun talking at the right time.
You get anything else to fix, come to me for help.
I'll be there in a moment.
Need something upgraded or repaired? We got enough duct tape to patch the whole zone up if need be!
I repair faults in hardware, not in its owner's arms.
Drop in next time you're in our neck of the woods.
A visitor? I'll be right there.
You're with us again, glad to see you.
What brings you to my forest, young man?
Are you here on business or just taking a hike?
Welcome to our humble science lab!
To what do I owe the pleasure?
It was nice talking to you.
